name: chemicals
short_description: Ammonium bicarbonate is the bicarbonate salt of ammonia. It is a clear, white crystalline solid with a faintsmell of ammonia. It is soluble in water and insoluble in alcohol and acetone. Between 36 to 60 degreecentigrade it decomposes into ammonia, water vapour and carbon dioxide. The aqueous solution ofammonium bicarbonate is slightly basic. Ammonium Bicarbonate is easily dissolved in water, which oftenis done by bakeries in their production sequences.
